com.google.appinventor.common.utils

Class StringUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.common.utils.StringUtils

  • public final class StringUtils
extends Object
    Helper class for working with strings.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static com.google.common.base.CharMatcher VALID_FILENAME_CHARS
      A CharMatcher that matches valid filename characters: [0-9],[a-z],[A-Z],'_','.', and '-'

      • quote

        public static String quote(String str)
        Returns the given string enclosed with quotation marks.
        Parameters:
        str - string to quote
        Returns:
        quoted string
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if str is null

      • unquote

        public static String unquote(String str)
        Returns the given quoted string without quotation marks.
        Parameters:
        str - quoted string
        Returns:
        string without quotation marks
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if str doesn't have a leading or a trailing quotation mark
        NullPointerException - if str is null

      • escape

        public static String escape(String str)
        Creates new string to display nicely in HTML.
        Parameters:
        str - string to escape
        Returns:
        escaped string or null if str was null

      • contains

        public static boolean contains(String[] array,
               String string)
        Indicates whether an array contains the given string.
        Parameters:
        array - array to check
        string - string to look for
        Returns:
        true if the string was found in the array, false otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either array or string is null

      • join

        public static String join(String delimiter,
          String[] strings)
        Returns a string consisting of the joined string array elements, separated by the delimiter.
        Parameters:
        delimiter - separates individual strings in the joined string
        strings - strings to join
        Returns:
        string resulting from joining the individual strings

      • join

        public static String join(String delimiter,
          Iterable<String> strings)
        Returns a string consisting of the joined strings, separated by the delimiter.
        Parameters:
        delimiter - separates array elements in created string
        strings - string elements to join
        Returns:
        string created of joined string array elements

      • replaceLastOccurrence

        public static String replaceLastOccurrence(String string,
                           String target,
                           String replacement)
        Returns a new String resulting from replacing the last occurrence of target in string with replacement. If target does not occur in string, string is returned.
        Parameters:
        string - the original string
        target - the value to be replaced
        replacement - the replacement value
        Returns:
        the resulting string

      • createProjectName

        public static String createProjectName(Set<String> existingProjectNames)
        Autogenerates a projectname and verifies it does not already exist in existingProjectNames

      • normalizeForFilename

        public static String normalizeForFilename(String str)
        Create a name safe for use in file paths from the provided String str. It is fairly conservative to attempt, not guarantee, maximum compatability for most operating systems.

      • toJson

        public static String toJson(String s)
        Converts a String to a JSON String. Returns null if the String is null.
